definition: a guy who stays at home all the time, typically spending a lot of time playing online games (derived from Japanese "otaku")
residence/(coll.) to stay in at home/to hang around at home
male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
die-hard otaku (sb who hardly ever emerges from their home, where they play games, watch movies etc)
otaku, a Japanese term for people with obsessive interests such as anime, manga, and video games/see also 宅男[zhai2 nan2]/see also 宅女[zhai2 nu:3]
fujoshi (woman who likes mangas about male homosexual love)
lolicon or rorikon (Japanese loanword)/manga or anime genre depicting young girls in an erotic manner
single girl who is not interested in relationships, living a lackadaisical life (loanword from Japanese "himono onna")
